name: Thomas H. Norstein
effect: [On Play] Trigger ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)[Main] If your opponent has 8 or more cards in their hand, you may suspend this Tamer to unsuspend 1 of your Digimon with [Gao] in its name.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
